span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: True 将引用替换为名称，而不考虑名称或引用的引用类型; 如果为 False， 则只将绝对引用替换为绝对名称，将相对引用仅替换为相对名称，而混合引用仅替换为混合名称。

span.span: True to replace references with names, regardless of the reference types of either the names or references; False to replace absolute references only with absolute names, relative references only with relative names, and mixed references only with mixed names.

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 如果 找不到指定区域的名称，则使用包含指定范围的行和列区域的名称; 如果为 False， 将 忽略 and 参数。

param.name: OmitRow

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 如果为 True，则用列方向的名称替换整个引用。

span.span: True to replace the entire reference with the column-oriented name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dirty() runtime managed

summary.span: 下一次重新计算发生时指定要重新计算的区域。

span.span: Designates a range to be recalculated when the next recalculation occurs.

para.span: 对于 Microsoft Excel 认为需要重新计算的单元格，该方法 强制重新计算指定区域。

span.span: The method forces the specified range to be recalculated, for cells that Microsoft Excel understands as needing recalculation.

para.span: 如果应用程序采用手动计算模式，则使用该方法将指示 Excel 识别要重新计算的指定单元格。

span.span: If the application is in manual calculation mode, using the method instructs Excel to identify the specified cell to be recalculated.

para.span: 如果应用程序处于自动计算模式，请使用 Dirty 方法使 Excel 执行重新计算。

span.span: If the application is in automatic calculation mode, using the Dirty method instructs Excel to perform a recalculation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DiscardChanges() runtime managed

summary.span: 放弃区域中经过编辑的单元格中的所有更改。

span.span: Discards all changes in the edited cells of the range.

para.span: 对于基于 OLAP 数据源的区域，该方法删除单元格中输入的所有值和公式，然后运行更新操作从数据源检索最新值。

span.span: For a range based on an OLAP data source, this method removes all values and formulas entered in the cells, and then runs an update operation to retrieve the latest values from the data source.

para.span: 它将编辑的所有值单元格的数据源值 (不为 Visual Basic) 中的空引用，并且还会对 OLAP 服务器执行 ROLLBACK TRANSACTION 语句。

span.span: It sets the data source value to a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) for all value cells that are edited, and also executes a ROLLBACK TRANSACTION statement against the OLAP server.

para.span: 对于基于非 OLAP 数据源的区域，此方法直接清除所有编辑过的单元格。

span.span: For ranges based on non-OLAP data sources, this method simply clears all edited cells.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ Formula { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置 A1 样式表示法和宏语言中的对象的公式。

span.span: Returns or sets the object's formula in A1-style notation and in the language of the macro.

para.span: 此属性对于 OLAP 数据源无效。

span.span: This property is not available for OLAP data sources.

para.span: 如果单元格包含一个常量，此属性返回该常量。

span.span: If the cell contains a constant, this property returns the constant.

para.span: 如果单元格为空，此 Formula 属性返回一个空字符串。

span.span: If the cell is empty, this Formula property returns an empty string.

para.span: 如果单元格包含公式，Formula 属性将该公式作为字符串返回，所用格式与在编辑栏（包括等号）中显示时的格式相同。

span.span: If the cell contains a formula, the Formula property returns the formula as a string in the same format that would be displayed in the formula bar (including the equal sign).

para.span: 如果将单元格的值或者公式设置为日期类型，则 Microsoft Excel 将检查此单元格的数字格式是否符合日期或者时间格式。如果不符合，Microsoft Excel 将把数字格式设置为默认的短日期格式。

span.span: If you set the value or formula of a cell to a date, Microsoft Excel checks to see whether that cell is already formatted with one of the date or time number formats. If not, Microsoft Excel changes the number format to the default short date number format.

para.span: 如果区域是一维或二维区域，可以将公式设置为相同维度的数组。

span.span: If the range is a one- or two-dimensional range, you can set the formula to an array of the same dimensions.

para.span: 同样，可以将公式放入 Basic 数组中。

span.span: Similarly, you can put the formula into a Basic array.

para.span: 如果为多单元格区域设置公式，则会用公式填充该区域所有的单元格。

span.span: Setting the formula for a multiple-cell range fills all cells in the range with the formula.

summary.span: 在分级显示中对一个区域进行升级（即降低其分级显示的级别）。

span.span: Promotes a range in an outline (that is, decreases its outline level).

para.span: 指定区域必须是行或列，或者行区域或列区域。

span.span: The specified range must be a row or column, or a range of rows or columns.

para.span: 如果指定区域在数据透视表中，本方法将对该区域内的项取消分组。

span.span: If the range is in a PivotTable report, this method ungroups the items contained in the range.

para.span: 如果当前单元格在父字段的字段标题中，则该字段中的所有分组将被取消，并且该字段从数据透视表中删除。当父字段中的最后一个分组被取消后，整个字段将从数据透视表中删除。

span.span: If the active cell is in a field header of a parent field, all the groups in that field are ungrouped and the field is removed from the PivotTable report. When the last group in a parent field is ungrouped, the entire field is removed from the report.
